ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: Minor Correction here.  The Glowing Stien was NOT part of the game until less than 1 week before the spoiler went up.  It was the reward for the Brewers
ygData.messageBody:
Minor Correction here. The Glowing Stien was NOT part of the game until less than
1 week before the spoiler went up. It was the reward for the Brewers Compendium
Quest. The quest, until recently, was broken. It returned Pungala's head (Ogre
Head), not the compendium. Many bartender's have tried this quest, and it was a
bartender who first completed it. On a side note, GM's informed several players
that the quest indeed worked, before the patch. They then came back and said it
will be fixed in an up coming patch (Another Lie)

>
> > Thought #5:
> >
> > There is no such thing as a "secret" on Everquest. There are too many
> > people playing the game, making any new discovery part of the common
> > knowledge base within a few weeks.
> >
>
> <Fact> This is pretty true for the most part, but the glowing stein was a part
> of the game from beta on, and it wasn't until 2 or 3 weeks ago that this became
> common knowledge. Verant also reports that less than 50% of the total different
> items in the game have been found.
>
> >
